plot: Squash champion Hashim Khan's athleticism, shrewdness and Pashtun heritage transformed his family's life and put Pakistan on the world map.
title: Keep Eye on Ball: The Hashim Khan Story
plot_es: Squash champion Hashim Khan's athleticism, shrewdness and Pashtun heritage transformed his family's life and put Pakistan on the world map.
original_name: Keep Eye on Ball: The Hashim Khan Story
plot_en: Squash champion Hashim Khan's athleticism, shrewdness and Pashtun heritage transformed his family's life and put Pakistan on the world map.
